name: Phase 3 local persistent identity
description: Generate and persist a local P2P identity (hypercore-crypto keypair) and show only the public fingerprint in the UI.
acceptance_criteria: Identity is generated with hypercore-crypto keyPair
Identity persists locally and is stable across restarts
Secret key is never exposed to the UI
